subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Now that the Islanders’ Chris Simon has been suspended for a record 25 games by the N.H.L., the debate is whether his suspension is long enough. The feeling here is yes.
snippet: Now that the Islanders’ Chris Simon has been suspended for a record 25 games by the N.H.L., the debate is whether his suspension is long enough. The feeling here is yes.
